rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with natural lighting, aligned according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious room with colonial charm, designed to accommodate family interactions and entertainment. Windows positioned on the eastern wall for sunlight.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, with an open concept layout allowing natural light from south-facing windows. Adheres to Vastu guidelines for dining spaces.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern colonial kitchen with efficient workflow and safety features. Open design aligning with Vastu for positive energy flow in the cooking area.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-placed bathroom with functional layout and natural light; positioned per Vastu guidelines to maintain privacy and positive energy.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with ample natural light from the eastern side, quiet zone as per Vastu recommendations to promote productivity.

rooms.name: Closet & Storage
rooms.description: Integrated closet space designed for storage solutions in line with colonial aesthetics and efficient use of space.

openings.description: Large arched entrance door on the western facade, ensuring ample light and energy flow per Vastu.
Multiple windows placed strategically across all rooms to maximize natural light and ventilation; eastern and southern orientations are prioritized.
A small balcony on the eastern side for leisure and to enhance ventilation in line with Vastu practices.

garden_area.description: Large garden area surrounding the cottage, designed with colonial landscaping and incorporating indigenous plants. The layout follows local building norms while optimizing space on an irregular plot.

irregular_plot_adjustments.note: As the plot is irregular, rooms have been arranged to maximize usable interior space while preserving garden aesthetics and adhering to Vastu principles.

additional_features.description: Steeply pitched roof characteristic of colonial architecture, ensuring proper drainage and aesthetic appeal.
Enhanced natural light, ventilation, and adherence to Vastu guidelines through the use of large windows in key areas.
